# alicloud\_rds\_collation\_time\_zones

Operation to query the character set collations and time zones available for use in ApsaraDB RDS.

-> **NOTE:** Available in v1.198.0+.

## Example Usage

Basic Usage

```typescript
import * as constructs from "constructs";
import * as cdktf from "cdktf";
/*Provider bindings are generated by running cdktf get.
See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.*/
import * as alicloud from "./.gen/providers/alicloud";
class MyConvertedCode extends cdktf.TerraformStack {
  constructor(scope: constructs.Construct, name: string) {
    super(scope, name);
    const dataAlicloudRdsCollationTimeZonesZones =
      new alicloud.dataAlicloudRdsCollationTimeZones.DataAlicloudRdsCollationTimeZones(
        this,
        "zones",
        {
          outputFile: "./classes.txt",
        }
      );
    new cdktf.TerraformOutput(this, "first_rds_collation_time_zones", {
      value: cdktf.propertyAccess(
        dataAlicloudRdsCollationTimeZonesZones.collationTimeZones,
        ["0"]
      ),
    });
  }
}

```

## Argument Reference

The following arguments are supported:

* `outputFile` - (Optional) File name where to save data source results (after running `terraform apply`).

## Argument Reference

The following attributes are exported in addition to the arguments listed above:

* `ids` - A list of time zones.
* `collationTimeZones` - An array that consists of the character set collations and time zones that are available for
  use in ApsaraDB RDS.
    * `description` - The code of the instance type.
    * `standardTimeOffset` - The offset of the UTC time. The offset is in the following format: (UTC+<i>HH:mm</i>).
    * `timeZone` - The time zone that is available for use in ApsaraDB RDS.
